ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh... Calm down bra. A WHITE con is a BLACK con depending on your screen. You get a black CON when you use the first screen setup (witht he smallest viewable
ygData.messageBody:
Heh... Calm down bra. A WHITE con is a BLACK con depending on your screen.
You get a black CON when you use the first screen setup (witht he smallest
viewable area of the world), and a BLACK con when it's the second screen
setup (the middle view, not the entire screen view).

White is the same as black which is YOUR level con.

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: Trevalien Manix [mailto:trevalien@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 2:23 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


From: "Trevalien Manix" <trevalien@...>

@%^#$@#^&%Y@$^*&@^%$#

This is ticking me off! Everyone is always talking about white cons. Why
has nothing EVER cond white to me? I have had green, blue, black, yellow,
and red, but never in all my levels (im 13 now) has anything cond white...Is

EQ broken or am i going crazy hehe!

Trevalien
Maby somthing in the Air Plane will con white to me

>Well, those people are STUPID IMHO. I don't mind people going AFK as long
>as
>they SAY TO THE DAMN GROUP THEY ARE AFK. I hate it when your the puller,
>you
>say scouting (I always say Scouting and Incoming when i'm pullnig for the
>group...ALWAYS). Some group member (usually some wizzie) say "Ok", you say
>"Imcoming!" and have a nasty white or yellow on yer ass, get back to the
>group, and they don't do squat while you get pounded. Now, lucky for us, we
>ALWAYS have SoW on (cuz I never go nito a dungeon anymore...*sigh*), and I
>can usually outrun the mob..but it ticks me off. Especially when I loose
>other group members cuz the healer or burner was AFK without saying it.
>
>AND, I htink anyone that is smart enough to use a dual monitor setup will
>be
>a good enough player... *chuckle* 'Cept for thouse that would just BUY the
>stuff and have someone else put it together.
>
>-Leod
